Course Description: THIS COURSE OFFERS AN OVERVIEW OF ACCOUNTING SOFTWARE APPLICATIONS IN BUSINESS ORGANIZATIONS. YOU WILL PROGRESSIVELY WORK THROUGH ACCOUNTING CYCLES FOR SERVICE AND MERCHANDISING BUSINESSES USING THE POPULAR ACCOUNTING SOFTWARE QUICKBOOKS. TRANSACTIONAL AND REPORTING AREAS WILL INCLUDE BANKING, CUSTOMERS, SALES, VENDORS, PURCHASES, INVENTORY, EMPLOYEES, PAYROLL, AND TAX REPORTS. SPECIFIC APPLICATIONS WILL INCLUDE DESIGN AND SETUP OF AN ACCOUNTING SYSTEM FOR A NEW BUSINESS. YOU WILL RECORD TRANSACTIONS, CREATE VARIOUS REPORTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. FURTHER MANAGERIAL APPLICATION INCLUDES FINANCIAL STATEMENT ANALYSIS, BUDGETING, AND ESTIMATES.
Textbook(s): DONNA KAY, COMPUTER ACCOUNTING WITH QUICKBOOKS (CURRENT EDITION), MCGRAW HILL.
